thought: The Slack message post action (action_1) currently has empty params, which causes the workflow execution to fail with an error indicating the workflow has issues. The Slack action requires specific parameters including 'select' (channel), 'channelId' with mode 'name' and value 'general', 'messageType' as 'text', and a 'text' field with an expression to extract the message text from input data. We need to set these parameters properly to enable sending the message to the #general channel.
plan: Set action_1 parameters to select channel 'general' by name.
Set messageType to 'text' to send simple text messages.
Set 'text' parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to use the 'text' field from input data.
Test action_1 to ensure it sends messages correctly to Slack channel #general.
criticism: Currently, action_1 has empty params which leads to execution failure. Proper parameters must be set for Slack message posting to work.

tool_input.comments: Send a formatted message to Slack channel #general with the list of files' names and IDs.
TODO: Test sending message to Slack #general channel
